channel.description: Recent content in Microservices on Note

item.title: Apisix Test Setup
item.description: I run into some challenges setting up the APISIX test. Documenting it here for my furture self. The overall step looks like this, # get source $ git clone git@github.com:apache/incubator-apisix.git $ cd incubator-apisix # prepare runtime and start apisix process $ etcd --enable-v2=true & $ make init # create config files $ make deps $ make run # install required test-nginx repo to sibling file path $ git clone https://github.com/openresty/test-nginx.git .
